classes.cCustomNote: One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, D2, Upper-Division D, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, D2, Upper-Division D, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).
Track Elective Group 1 (12 units): JOUR312; JOUR352 or JOUR353; JOUR304, JOUR333, or JOUR334.

Students encouraged to pursue minors or develop other areas of interest outside of Journalism, Media, Mass Communication through 36 Approved Elective units. At least 24 units must be upper-division courses with a lecture or seminar component. See Catalog for other restrictions. This excludes activity-only, lab-only, or supervision courses such as internships. No courses in Journalism/Media/Mass Communication, or some related courses offered by other departments. See restricted list in catalog.

If courses meeting GE requirements are used to satisfy Major requirements, additional units of free electives may be needed to satisfy the requirement of 180 units for the degree. No courses in JOUR/Media/Mass Communications. See restricted list in catalog.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, D2, Upper-Division D, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR).

Track Elective Group 1 (12 units): JOUR312; JOUR352 or JOUR353; JOUR304, JOUR333, or JOUR334.

Select any JOUR courses not already used in major, or select from JOUR/Media/Mass Communications Electives in catalog. 16 units maximum of Media/Mass Comm Electives. This is particularly relevant to students pursuing minors in Agricultural Communication; Art & Design; Communication Studies; English; Graphic Communication; Integrated Marketing Communications; and Media Arts, Society, and Technology.
